title: Portfolio: 0 BTC in real trading mode
body:
## Step 1: Have you search for this issue before posting it?

If you have discovered a bug in the bot, please [search our issue tracker](https://github.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot/issues?q=is%3Aissue). 
If it hasn't been reported, please create a new issue.

## Step 2: Describe your environment
  * OS : Windows
  * Python Version: 3.8
  * In case you are not using a binary version:
    * Branch: Master
    * Last Commit ID: ?
 
## Step 3: Describe the problem:
**Describe the bug**
Everything works without any problem in simulated trading mode. And now i switched to real trading mode now with Binance exchange but Portfolio: 0 BTC occures in Portfolio page. It says "Nothing there. If a trader is enabled, please check your OctoBot logs. There might be an issue with your exchange credentials." but there isn't any error log at logs page:

<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

Time | Level | Source | Message
-- | -- | -- | --
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | RedditService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | TelegramService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | WebHookService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | TwitterService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:54 | WARNING | ExchangeBuilder | There wont be any order created on binance: neither simulated nor real trader has been activated.
2021-05-14 20:06:52 | ERROR | Configuration | Real trader and trader simulator are deactivated in configuration. This will prevent OctoBot from creating any new order.

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

**Expected behavior**
I checked API settings at Binance; Reading enabled and Enable Spot & Margin trading are checked.

### Steps to reproduce:

  1. Start Octobot.
  2. Create and enable API from Binance.
  3. Define your api credentials to Octobot.
  4. Start real trading mode and restart Octobot.
  5. Open Portfolio page and Portfolio: 0 BTC occures.
  
### Observed Results:

  * What happened?
  * What did you expect to happen?

### Relevant code exceptions or logs:
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
 
```
<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

Time | Level | Source | Message
-- | -- | -- | --
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | RedditService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | TelegramService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | WebHookService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:56 | WARNING | ServiceFactory | TwitterService can't be initialized: configuration is missing, wrong or incomplete !
2021-05-14 20:06:54 | WARNING | ExchangeBuilder | There wont be any order created on binance: neither simulated nor real trader has been activated.
2021-05-14 20:06:52 | ERROR | Configuration | Real trader and trader simulator are deactivated in configuration. This will prevent OctoBot from creating any new order.

<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>
```
